39464121.review:
[h1] "我该如何拯救你？我的爱人"[/h1]                
[b] 这个可能不是最好的故事和结局，但这一定能让你思考的故事[/b]

[u]首先这个游戏时长3-4小时、而且没有一句对白（只有简单的提示）、画风也是那种油画风（每一帧都能截图）、细节很多、有一定的解密要素（[strike] 我卡过关！maye[/strike]）[/u]不得不说这种游戏真得能让人思考很久，每个人 有都各自有故事，同样是震撼，同样是感动，游戏和电影能够给人完全不同的体验。
    [b] 改变一件事另一件事就会改变	[/b]  
[spoiler] 现实没有如果，现实也没有或许，有一些事情你是无法改变的，即使你有回溯时间的能力。这层隐喻恰恰变成了发生在过去导致失去妻子的车祸原因扑朔迷离，而在妻子死去之后的痛苦现在和未来已成定局。男主最终选择了牺牲自己，让妻子代替自己活下去	[/spoiler]
[u] 总得来说这是个很不错的游戏，值得一玩（纯剧情向爱好者不能错过）	[/u]第一次写这么长的....

39455553.review:
Линейная игра, вы ничего не можете, задумываться над ходом игры не стоит, итог один. С десяток раз пройдите одни и те же моменты. Под стоны и крики в конце. К середине игры геймплей, просто, надоел, начало игры забылось и стало безразлично.[spoiler] Пробегите сотню раз по одним и тем же местам в надежде, что-то исправить и вам исправить ничего не дадут. Музыка вообще хорошая, но без этой игры, потому что подобрана она  местами ужасно. Смазанная картинка + и - одновременно. В начале приятно, необычно, а в процессе игры хочется и вдаль посмотреть и город по детальнее осмотреть, так же как и вся игра надоедает. Сюжет, ну совсем глупость, написан Великим-псевдомыслителем. Ты( герой, слепой про-драйвер) можешь изменить прошлое и спасти любимую женщину, но ХеХ там плавал, в начале причиной смерти станет резкий поворот на скорости 15 км/ч, чтобы спасти мальчика- проблему решили, мальчика на дороге нет. Всё хорошо? Конечно, как у главного героя с глазами. Теперь вы сделаете тоже самое, только из-за разбросанных по дороге коробок. Ладно, бывает. Решили проблему, теперь все живы? Да, все, кроме любимой женщины. Да, какого кривого охотника?!. Ну мы(разработчики) придумали ФАНТАСТИЧЕСКИ крутой ход, КАРОЧЕ, вы всех с дороги убрали, НО над дорогой каменный выступ, на этот выступ придёт охотник, за птицей. Круто? конечно. Ладно, 0 положительных эмоций, но ради хорошего финала(по отзывам и наградам) я исправлю и это. Всё, нет охотника на дороге, можно пожить?
Ну да... Что не так? Ну там у твоей бабы припадок, кароч делай тоже самое, только за деда.  Серьёзно?
И вот, когда игра реально заебала, когда ты проникся ко всем персонажам, кроме очевидно никакого охотника, когда тебе уже плевать, что будет дальше. Она начинает орать... Боже, как это мерзко... и несколько раз...[/spoiler]
НЕ стоит своих денег, Не стоит наград.

[i]Desde '' To the Moon'', um jogo não havia me feito chorar igual criancinha, mas parabéns '' Last Day of June '' você conseguiu.
O jogo lembra muito ''Life is Strange '' no conceito da volta ao tempo, e análise de ação vs consequência, a música também ( Toda instrumental S2 ),mas o modo de fazer essa ''viagem'' me lembrou do filme '' Amor além da Vida '' com Robin Williams, a história do casal nos faz lembrar do filme UP-Altas Aventuras, e algumas referências são internas, e é isso o que o jogo nos faz sentir, além de nos fazer lembrar de todos esses ''links'' externos também nos leva a pensar e a lembrar de pequenas coisas de dentro de nós mesmos.

39406425.review: last day of june…可能是一开始黄昏下爱人甜蜜的幸福蓝图太接近我也企及的未来，所以从一开始就期待可以有一个圆满的完美结局。三次在回忆里改变当时的致死因素来挽救女主，都成功了，希望越来越大，但在第四个回忆里时，伴随着女主绝望的哭喊，逼我三次都只能走向相同的路重复做下相同的决定——会导致悲剧重演的决定。此时右下角弹出弹框：解锁成就——有些事情无法改变，我就明白这注定只能是悲剧…把每个回忆都尽力描绘成了最好的样子，在想象中把过去改写，然后按下记住键。而故事的结尾才意识到，要脱离痛苦，也只有一个选项——把那些美好都遗忘。如果悲剧是必然的，那么死亡由我来承担吧…因为…如果失去你，我失去的何止爱情啊，还有人生。

39207835.review:
[h1]Overview[/h1]
This game is beautiful. It also sounds great and I haven't had any issue with saves or bugs. The gameplay is easy to grasp and runs smoothly. The characters don't speak but basically make a bunch of random noises. Given the scene and a lot of 'show don't tell' you understand what the scene is trying to get across. I do feel the characters have interesting back story and you get the sense they all have a part to play in the events in the game. Everything seems to have a purpose and I never noticed unnecessary characters or items. 

I'll update if I finish the game and I need to correct my issues with the story. As of right now, not sure if and when I'll finish it. If you love Indie titles then I think you will love this game regardless of the story. Otherwise, I wouldn't really recommend to most people. 

[h1]SPOILERS AHEAD[/h1]


[spoiler]So why am I not recommending? 

Well I can't really get into this games story. I'll start with the dialogue. I understand why they choose this style but I find it annoys me more than if they just spoke. It doesn't feel out of place, the art style lends itself well to the gibberesh dialogue(not sure exactly what you call this style). I would compare it to the way world leaders in civilization revolution talk when you interact with them. I enjoyed it in that game, but for some reason I just didn't enjoy it here. I feel there might just be too much of it in any given scene. This is more of a personal taste for me. It seems to work for most people but just know that going in. 

My main issue is with the story. I had the impression that the story was fixing a string of events that led to you crashing the car and the death of june. After I finished the story of the kid, you see the car continue driving and the wreck seems to be avoided. I thought I somehow ended the game really early and missed a huge chunk of story. Then you get into the next memory and it turns out that basically the road home is prone to the people of the town just ending up in the middle and causing the Carl and June to get into wrecks. Considering this is basically a walking sim(although one of the best visually I've ever played) I kind of what the story to interest me. It uses emotional plot points to supplement but that doesn't really do anything for the story. Just makes you feel bad for the characters. Once I realized that the story was just getting everyone off the road so you could get home safely I lost interest. They may be the wrong assumption but I won't find out till I go and finish the game. 
[/spoiler]

39201837.review:
有些事情你无法改变。
这种无力感在最后一刻被升华到了极致——当所有的选择都摆在你面前，你激动不已，以为自己可以改变一切，还给大家一个HAPPY ENDING，但事实上只是徒劳。一遍又一遍的得到车祸的结局。

我更愿意将这个故事理解为放弃执念与向前看。不仅是死去的灵魂，也有还活着的人们。

出车祸死去的Carl，和RiME里出海溺水的小男孩，他们都一样有着对这个世界的不舍和眷恋，Carl一遍又一遍的想改变结局，小男孩在陌生的岛屿中追寻父亲的踪迹……
但无数的尝试和冒险告诉他们，结局无法被改变。万事无常，每个人都在既定的路上走，而命运就是命运。悲欢离合本就是人生的一部分，或早或晚、避不开逃不掉，我们唯一的选择就是接受它，然后继续向前走。
Carl选择坐在副驾驶；小男孩选择跳下往生池……
June选择面对那片小湖泊；小男孩的父亲选择放飞红色披风……
Everything will gonna be ok.

39159235.review:
Sehr schön gemachtes Spiel! Interessanter grafischer Stil gemischt mit tollen Details. Die Story ist so konzipiert, dass ein Spielen auch ohne Dialoge möglich ist und man sich die Dialoge durch die Gestik zusammenreimen kann.
Es ist sehr ähnlich zu Life is strange aufgebaut, aber im Vergleich gibt es hier nur einen Ausgang der Geschichte. Ich musste teilweise wirklich ein wenig knobeln, bis ich darauf gekommen bin, wie es weitergehen kann - an einer Stelle hat mir nur Google geholfen :D Nach dem ersten Kniffeln ist das Spiel zum Großteil aber ein Selbstgänger und erklärt sich von alleine. Da es sich auch nur um eine kleine, schöne Welt handelt, kann man sich zum Glück nicht allzu sehr verlaufen.
Das Ende ist auf der einen Seite sehr überraschend und auf der anderen Seite doch sehr vorhersehbar. 

Alles in allem ein tolles Spiel, welches ich wirklich empfehlen kann!

39116036.review: Artistiquement beau. Je n'ai pas assez de recul (vu le peu de temps joué) pour juger de toute la réalisation mais voici mes impressions après une prise en main rapide. Si l'idée du scénario est très bonne, le gameplay reste très limité et très dirigiste (déplacement et bouton A). Même les choix que nous aurons parfois à faire sont imposés si on veut avancer. Une chose que j'ai détesté, c'est la présence quasi permanante de cinématiques (même dans les phases de jeu) ; elles reviennes sans arrêt, à la moindre action, au moins 90% du temps. Le côté "contemplatif" du jeu n'est malheureusement pas assez poussé pour me faire aimer à juste regarder, j'aurais préférer jouer sans être coupé toutes les 1min. Dernier point négatif, l'aspect répétitif alors que je n'ai fait que le début. D'autant plus répétitif qu'il n'y a que des cinématiques dans ce jeu. Il est court et je vais donc tout de même essayer de le finir, mais plus tard car il me lasse très vite. 20€ pour ce jeu c'est juste de l'abus à mon goût, mais pour 10€ en promo ok. Ma note finale aurait cependant été au dessus de la moyenne mais je ne recommanderais pas ce jeu car malgré sa subjective beauté j'y trouve des erreurs de réalisation à mon goût (mais je me sens seul quand je vois les évalutions générales). Je lui préfère 100 fois "Brothers" ou "Valiant Heart  : ..."

39089024.review:
刚完结游戏就赶紧过来写测评了，脑海至今还回荡着这两句话......“人生有两次死亡，一次是心碎，一次是身死”和“无论尝试多少次，我都要去救你，即使结局无法改变”....确实我是个很容易被感动的人，本来由于其游戏性之差，我本就想赶紧完结给差评的，但是到了老人的章节之后，我只能说，感动我，你做到了~而且很多细节的地方体现了游戏没有明显表现的剧情线，每次选择时间线时传来女主用笔摩擦纸张的声音，女主高兴收到礼物时传来痛苦的哭声，那个记载着解谜推敲过程的本子......这一切的一切，如果我是男主，我会很自豪地说用我两次死亡换你一次，不亏~
       剧情短小精悍，音乐制作良心，画面风格独特，感觉团队在色彩上花了蛮大力气的，给完甜枣就要给棒槌了~
       首先是游戏形式多以过场动画为主，并且如果新人玩的话重复性高，重点是还不能随时保存进度，必须到了画室才能自动保存，简直是毁灭人性的设定，特别是对于成就党而言！！！！所以在经历小孩子章节失败并且没拿完成就回去重新过的过程有种被强行增加游戏时间的赶脚！！！然后？我只能选择看攻略来一遍过了！
        其次是我购买游戏时以为是剧情点击为主的，没想到中间大部分章节是解谜，解谜就算了......那个动画动画动画呀！！！！重要事情说三遍，真的好长呀-.我是不能理解那些没看攻略自己慢慢琢磨重复看动画的人的心情的了~
       反正烦躁的心情一直维持到老人末章，是的，这必须是一个转折点，可能制作组也发现再这么下去会出事，所以赶紧补救，本来就想着完成了全成就就给它个差评的，过完最后章节我没办法违背我的内心，它......确实打动了我，也让我对爱情重新有了一丝幻想，嗯，没用错词，确实是“幻想”......

39058096.review:
К моему личному расстройству игра оказалось больше игровым фильмом, чем квестом. Нам предлагают спасти Джун. В этом красивом мире есть множество взаимосвязанных историй, каждая из которых несет частицу общей истории. Проходить было интересно, потому как разработчики вложили интересную концепцию, которую можно было бы существенно развить и в тоже время превратить в финал в любой момент. Именно здесь и прослеживается четкая линия в разработке игры такого уровня – когда весь ресурс у разработчиков исчерпан – финал наступает быстро. Они приняли решение завершить историю там, где возможно сделать игрового прохождения ещё ровно на такое же количество времени, сколько занимает сама игра.

Очень не понравилось консольное воплощение в повествовании, когда многие сценарные повороты или игровые элементы нельзя пропустить если ты их переигрываешь. Если ты уже несколько раз видел cut сцену - она будет опять повторяться полностью.

В игре такого жанра возникает важный вопрос – что именно хотели сказать разработчики своим повествованием и финалом. Над этим думаешь уже смотря финальные титры и прохождение игры стоит того, чтобы такой вопрос возник.      
 
Оценка 8 из 10.

39053196.review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a full review, and NOT a first impressions review [/h1]

Last Day of June is a game developed by Ovosonico and published by 505 Games

Last Day of June kinda reminds me of Groundhog Day, you repeat the same day over and over, from differemt perspectives, making minor adjustments to try and get the outcome your character desires

The different perspectives interact with each other; leave a gate unlocked from one perspective, and the other perspectives can see it. It's not a real-tme switch; you play one character's entire day, resulting in some outcome, and only after you receive that outcome can you switch to another character and the outcomes, together, determine the result

It's actually a pretty cool way to tell a story, if not somewhat repetitive. I've never seen it done quite this way and the game is distinctive and reasonably pretty

The only issue I had with Last Day of June is that the game has these little mini cut-scenes that are repated way too many, many times and that you cannot fast-forward or skip and each time there is like 30-60 seconds of unskippable cut-scenes which if you're playing in one whole sitting can get pretty annoying and repetitive

And then, at the end of each day for each character, you're forced to watch the entire outcome, over and over and over again. This is a LONG cut scene, that you can't skip, and if you're going back and forth between 2 or 3 characters it adds a lot of repetitiveness and frustration

I would have enjoyed the game a lot more if you could either skip the cutscenes entirely or if they didn't make you repeat certain unnecessary parts

However, overall, Last Day of June sums up a wonderful, beautifully aesthetic story that should not be missed. Just relax, don't let the overall repetitiveness of the game get to you and enjoy the wonderful story Last Day of June has to offer

[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]

39048906.review:
DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE EXPECTING GAMEPLAY.

39033717.review:
"What would you do to save the one you love?"
The dramatic question warns you about the emotional subject which Last Day of June brings to the table.
With its simple, cute art style and its atmosphere you can tell the game really tries to get the player to feel sad, upset and emotionally involved in the grim story. 
Unfortunately, as hopeful as I was when I bought it, Last day of June really didn't manage to leave me as heartbroken as it probably wanted. I have to say the non verbal interactions don't really work as well as they might have thought they would, and the repetitive puzzle just gets more frustrating everytime instead of making the plot darker, which was probably the original intention.
The story is indeed upsetting, but because of the game mechanics you tend to feel almost bored, like you just want to get to the end so you can stop doing the same thing over and over again, instead of growing some form of attachment to the characters.
Many people were left sad, some say they cried, but I'm genuinely sorry to say that the game did not really manage to strike a chord. You can see what the developers were aiming for, but it was just poorly executed.
I would recommend the game on sale, and if you're easily satisfied by short animated novels.
Otherwise, to me, Last Day of June is just a missed opportunity, that could have been a [b]really[/b] heartbreaking story.

38988944.review:
ПРИШЛО ВРЕМЯ ОТКРЫВАТЬ КАЛИТКИ И ВАЛЯТЬ ЦВЕТОЧНЫЕ ГОРШКИ
КАЛИТКИ САМИ НЕ ОТКРОЮТСЯ, А ГОРШКИ - НЕ ПОВАЛЯТСЯ
ОТКРОЙ КАЛИТКУ И ПОВАЛИ ГОРШОК ЕЩЕ РАЗ
ЗАЧЕМ МНЕ НУЖНА ДРАМА И ЭФФЕКТ БАБОЧКИ, Я ВСЕ ЭТО ВИДЕЛ В КИНЕМАТОГРАФЕ
ЛУЧШЕ ЕЩЕ РАЗ ОТКРЫТЬ КАЛИТКУ И ПОВАЛИТЬ ГОРШОК
Я ОТКРЫВАЮ КАЛИТКИ И ВАЛЯЮ ГОРШКИ ПО ТРИ РАЗА ЗА ЛОКАЦИЮ
КАЖДОЕ ОТКРЫТИЕ КАЛИТКИ ЗАНИМАЕТ У МЕНЯ ПЯТЬ СЕКУНД
Я ЖИВУ АКТИВНОЙ И ПОЛНОЦЕННОЙ ЖИЗНЬЮ
Я УСПЕШЕН И ПОЭТОМУ ЦЕЛЫЙ ДЕНЬ ИГРАЮ В МЯЧ, БЕГАЮ И СТРЕЛЯЮ В ПТИЦ, САЖАЮ ЦВЕТЫ
А ПОСЛЕ ЭТОГО ОТКРЫВАЮ КАЛИТКИ
....

Я не рекомендую играть в The Last Day of June из-за завязки: она здесь крайне проста: попали в аварию – жена умерла, ГГ – инвалид в депрессии, нужно все это исправить. Исправление, видимо, реализованное как есть в силу бедности ресурсов, затраченных на разработку, представляет собой слезодавильную беготню по единственной локации в стиле «Эффекта бабочки», «Дня сурка» и «Грани будущего» в попытке что-то исправить. Видели названные фильмы – особенно ничего нового в игре не найдете.

Я не рекомендую играть в The Last Day of June из-за геймплея: его здесь не только нет, так еще продолжительность искусственно затянута медлительностью некоторых сцен и невозможностью перемотки уже виденного. Готовьтесь провести несколько часов в небольшом закутке-деревне, где придется изучить каждый столбик.

Я не рекомендую играть в The Last Day of June из-за графики и технической части. Стиль и дизайн безусловно хороши, но техническое исполнение местами подкачало: движок подтормаживает даже на мощной конфигурации в разрешениях выше FullHD, вылетает, да и вообще картинка палитрой разъедает глаза. 

Однако, я рекомендую претерпевать вышеназванные недостатки из-за концовки и общего посыла, который, в общем и целом, правильный и жизненный. В сравнении с проектами, направленными исключительно на развлечение, здесь победа очевидна. Именно ради нее стоит узнать эту небольшую историю.

38985141.review: Nothing I expected; much more than that. It's the best game I've played in the last couple of years. Gorgeous graphics, "Pink Floyd-ish" sound-track, beautiful story.

38981095.review:
Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit dem Spiel, habe durch eine Vorstellung des Spiels auf Youtube erfahren. 
Ich habe es für 12€ anstatt der 20€ gekauft.
Die Story ist relativ simpel, jedoch ziemlich gut, ebenso könnte man das ganze Spiel bezeichnen. 
Die Steuerung ist einfach gehalten, das Spiel sieht super aus. 
Ich hatte keine Probleme mit Bugs oder sonstigen Fehlern welche das Spielerlebnis beeinträchtigen.

Ein kleinwenig bin ich vom Ende enttäuscht, keinesfalls war es schlecht, jedoch habe ich aufgrund der Reviews und Erzählungen über ein emotionales Ende zu viel erwartet. Die Spielwelt ist klein gehalten, was mit der Zeit umso schöner ist, bekannte Orte immer wieder in einem anderen Licht zu sehen, aufgrund dessen, dass man einen anderer Charakter spielt.
Für das ganze Spiel habe ich um die 4 Stunden gebraucht, etwas länger als viele andere.

Ich kann das Spiel jedem empfehlen, der auf emotionale Telltale-Games wie z.B. LiS o.ä. steht.

38938919.review:
A narrative styled game done right!

It's amazing how the creators were able to convey a variety of emotions without a single word of dialogue. It was all done through beautfiul illustrations and facial expressions.

The story is very well crafted and is emotionally engaging. I could seriously empathise with the frustrations felt by the main character as he kept trying again and again to accomplish his goal but he never seems to achieve it... despite being given the illusion that he has already achieved his goal and everything is supposed to return to normal, repeatedly.

The music used in this game gave off the same vibes as the game 'Life is Strange' did which is a good thing. They played a very vital role in conveying the atmosphere of the scene and they fulfilled that role almost perfectly.

Overall, if you are into games such as Life Is Strange, Journey, Abzu, Rain and To The Moon, I think you will truly enjoy this masterpiece.

38903401.review: Opowiesc o milosci, oddaniu, stracie i tesknocie podana w kolorowej, wesolej wrecz oprawie. Przy okazji rozwiazujac bardzo proste zagadki srodowiskowe i zbierajac znajdzki poznajemy historie kazdego z bohaterow, ktore chociaz posrednio, to w istotny sposob wplywaja na to, co te postacie robia w przezywany wciaz na nowo tytulowy ostatni dzien. Last Day of June nie jest typowa gra, stawane przed graczem zadania nie stanowia wielkiego wyzwania i przejscie jej zajmuje okolo 4 godzin. Jednak o sile tego tytulu decyduje glownie ciezar emocjonalny opowiadanej historii oraz ciekawa i nieczesto spotykana mechanika resetowania wydarzen oraz proby ich zmiany w taki sposob, by wreszcie osiagnac szczesliwe zakonczenie przedstawionej w grze opowiesci. Mnie sie Last Day of June bardzo podobal i goraco ten tytul polecam.

38864326.review:
Oh boy, is this a walking simulator? It's closer to a simple adventure game as you'll be collecting things and solving puzzles, although the puzzles can really only go one way to advance the plot.

The good: the graphics are great, most of the time. The artwork style has a sort of dreamy abstraction that I really liked. I went in expecting a linear walking simulator experience and found more gameplay than I was expecting (although not much more) so that was nice.

The bad: the characters, and by that I mean how they are realized. They all lack eyes, and so look super-creepy to me. They also communicate via grunts and other simple noises. The net effect for me was to be creeped out by most conversations, and I never felt any real emotional investment in these creepy dolls. That's a problem, because the game needs you to make that connection, and I could not get past the creepiness.

Also bad: you'll be replaying the same cutscenes over and over and over and over as you trial-and-error yourself through the stages. That got old very very quickly and ultimately made the game a chore to finish. The game saves in certain spots that you cannot control, so if you get bored of trying to complete a sequence and want to come back later, you get to start over from the beginning of that sequence. There are also collectibles that are missable, and it's impossible to go back and get them - you won't know you've missed your opportunity until it's too late. The game is far too tedious to give it a second playthrough to finish this up.

On the whole, I wanted this game to click for me but it was a letdown. I'd rate it 2 out of 5: avoid unless you are absolutely in love with the artwork as presented on the store page and don't mind hollow-eyed creepy grunting characters.

Not recommended.

38863945.review:
Aufmerksam wurde ich durch Steven Wilson. Für Last Day of June hat man sich bei den Musikvideos von DRIVE HOME und offenbar auch ROUTINE beeinflussen lassen. Ich war sehr gespannt, wie die Umsetzung gelungen ist. 
Das eigentliche Spiel ist an für sich voll in Ordnung, dass Highlight ist und bleibt jedoch der SOUNDTRACK. Dieser stammt nämlich von keinem geringeren als STEVEN WILSON - Meister des Prog Rocks. Für die Spielemusik verwendete Wilson einige seiner bekannteren Stücke, bearbeitete diese und setzte diese kongenial in Szene. Wer Wilsons Musik kennt, der weiß was für eine unglaubliche Melanchlolie, die zeitweise ins depressive geht, darin steckt. Und diese ist es auch, die die gezeigten Spieleszenen sehr passend vertont.
 Insgesamt wird durch diese Kombination aus ergreifenden Szenen und der perfekten Musik von Steven Wilson eine emotionale Achterbahnfahrt. Hier darf und soll man ruhig ein paar Tränen vergießen. Wer sich darauf enlassen will, der wird mit einem schönen Spiel und einer schönen Spielmusik belohnt. Und allen Wilson-Fans kann ich das Spiel eh empfehlen.

38861260.review:
通关纪念。
一开始冲着画风买的，也没想太多，意外的自己倒是很喜欢这种风格。
然后中间玩着玩着因为循环往复次数太多开始有点昏昏欲睡，直接不耐烦了起来。
终于到了老爷爷那里世界崩塌的时候开始有了点波动。
然后最后场景一瞬间切换到june在carl墓碑前抚摸他的眼镜的那一刻，配着BGM，真的是一点预兆都没有的，一瞬间就哭了。
结尾june和儿子的彩蛋更是直接泪奔。
这个结尾拯救了我之前感受到的所有的枯燥，看着那个「你永远无法阻止」的成就现在百感交集。
老实说我已经很久不关注以爱情为主题的游戏甚至是电影电视剧动漫了，偶尔看的作品在我看来也是毫无波动，但是这个爱情故事，毋庸置疑，彻底打动了我。
非常感谢遇见你。

38856466.review:
Una bellissima esperienza, breve ma intensa. Direzione artistica pazzesca, character design originalissimo, concept fresco, Musiche di S. Wilson, ultra toccante. Ovviamente stra-consigliato.

Una nota che mi è piaciuta davvero molto: Siamo abituati a giochi giganteschi che dovrebbero puntare molto sul concetto di  "esplorazione" ma nei quali di fatto ci si limita a correre dal punto A al punto B di immense praterie senza neanche preoccuparsi della cura (o meno) con cui sono state realizzate. In questo titolo esploriamo un unica mappa, più e più volte, avendo modo di scoprirne davvero i molti dettagli e godendoci i particolari di un level desing legato a doppio filo con le meccaniche di gameplay. Il piccolo "miracolo" di ovosonico in tutto questo è che non c'è quel retrogusto amaro di ripetitività che capita spesso di sentire quando un gioco propone una sezione di backtracking, ma per l'appunto, una sensazione di appagamento e scoperta.

38801667.review:
In short: a great indie game from Italy.

Well it really is : ) Last of June gives you very good emotion filled experience. Add Steven Wilson's music to great watercolour-like artwork and you'll have astonishing blend of natural beauty in storytelling. 

There's lot of talk around game being buggy. Saves are corrupted etc. Well it did not happen to me - played much later as well, so I can not comment on this.

The story. 
It's quite simple and therein lies its greatness. Cute couple Carl and June are relaxing after picnic on their favourite pier and due to rising storm have to rush home. Then the gamepad starts vibrating - something happened. Death. One person has died and death wraps it’s veil around many people. Kurt Cobain’s “All in all is all we all are” came to mind and player is actually given control to use different gameworld characters to butterfly effect the moment that happened.

So you can steer the story with 6 characters total, but you still know you are doing this for Carl. Carl is interesting...I don’t know many games having wheelchair protagonist in it; he carries the darkness and hopelessness in the narrative and through him we can play deus ex machina with what happened. Sadness and regret are therefore always granted in this colourful world albeit the other characters you play do not know what’s going to happen. 

I like that the developers packed pretty serious topics of death, loss, regret, emptiness etc to a nice portable package. It’s presented in-game as a gift as well, unavoidable and has to be accepted.The graphics, music and very very well done solution for voice acting all ease the creeping moments of “not again” and “I don’t want this to happen”.

Game controls are easy, I played it with controller but looked like with keyboard and mouse it’s the same. There are some things that might annoy you - you can not skip cutscenes and due to repetitiveness of the moment you are trying to alter, well they happen again and happen and…. Also some scenes made me feel rushed and too much scripted. Game is short, I don't know if it's a bad thing or not, but I don't like to keep games running to get trading cards. Just a Steam thing, not games fault.

Long story short - very well made game.

Funny emotion that I had was “Carl really is a bad driver”.

added: 29.12.2017

38660305.review:
PS4에 출시됐을 때부터 눈여겨 보던 게임. 할로윈 세일 즈음에 사두었다가 크리스마스에 플레이 하게 됐다. 첫인상은 독특한 캐릭터가 큰 몫을 했다. 눈이 함몰되어 있어서 어쩐지 공포감을 주는 것. 플레이 해보니 말도 호에에? 후아? 으어? 같은 의성어만 뱉는다. 초반 플레이에서의 당혹감은 어떻게 지울 수가 없다. 하지만 눈물을 자아내는 스토리라고 하니, 딱히 큰 도움이 되지는 않지만 그래도 없으면 너무 아쉬울 것 같은 한글 텍스트에 감사하며 진행해 나갔다.

이웃집 할아버지가 건네준 선물을 받은 아내, 준. 잠든 남편이 깨기 전 선물을 어디에 숨길까 고민하다가, 추억이 깃든 근처 호숫가에서 건네 주기로 결심한다. 잠에서 깬 남자는 아내의 선물은 눈치채지 못한 채 나들이 제안을 받아들이고, 둘은 다정하게 차를 몰고 외출한다. 호숫가에 앉아 오붓한 시간을 보내던 두 사람은, 갑작스레 쏟아지는 비를 피해 차를 타고 집으로 돌아간다. 여기까지 인트로 끝.

제목부터 '준의 마지막 날'. 언젠가 죽겠거니 했지만 인트로가 끝났을 뿐인데 준은 없다. 둘이 앉아 있던 의자엔 남자 홀로 앉아 있고, 그의 다른 옆엔 휠체어가 놓여 있다. 짐작이 되기 시작하는 그들의 사연. 닫아 놓았던 준의 화실 문을 열게 되는 남자는 준의 그림에서 신비한 빛을 발견한다. 그림과 상호작용해서 그날의 기억을 되짚는 남자. 빛을 따라 나온 집 밖은 둘의 추억으로 가득하다. 두 사람의 추억을 되짚어 보며 그 날에 영향을 줬던 마을 사람들의 그림을 마주하게 되는 남자.

친구가 없는 외로운 아이, 두 사람의 절친한 친구, 아버지를 닮고 싶어하는 아들, 선물을 건네 준 할아버지. 준이 그린 이웃사람들의 그림을 통해 남자는 그 날의 일들을 조금씩 고쳐 나간다. 게임의 방식은 사고가 일어나지 않게 하기 위해, 준을 살리기 위해 여러 연쇄작용을 고려해 퍼즐을 풀어나가는 것. 하루의 과정을 마쳐야만 다른 인물의 선택을 수정할 수 있어서, 같은 하루를 몇 번이고 반복해야 한다. 봤던 장면이어도 스킵은 불가능해서 사실상 할 수 있는 것은 많지 않은데도 플레이 시간이 몇 배로 늘어나는 단점이 있다. 반복되는 과정을 지루해하고 느린 전개에 답답해하는 편이라면 고통스러울 수 있는 게임. 내겐 그런 게임이었음을 부정하긴 힘들다.

반복 플레이와 느린 전개의 답답함에도 불구하고, 또 쉽게 예상할 수 있는 '그래도 어쩔 수 없는 일들이 있더라' 라는 흔한 교훈 역시 차치하고서라도 만족스러운 편이다. 수채화 같은 서정적인 색감과 차분하고 낭만적인 분위기, 인물들 사이에 느껴지는 진심 어린 애정, 각자를 위해 택하는 모든 선택들이 가볍게 느껴지지 않았다. 절친 파트까지는 튜토리얼 느낌이었다면, 할아버지 파트부터가 이 게임의 하이라이트. 사랑하는 사람을 잃고도 계속 살아가는 사람들의 마음을 생각해보게 한다는 것만으로도, 이 게임은 가치 있고, 쓸쓸하다.

분량은 한참 헤맨 기준으로도 4시간. 반복 재생을 보지 않는다면 1/3이면 될 것 같다. 절친의 기억 하나를 나중에 찾을 기회가 있을 줄 알았는데, 할아버지 파트에서 되돌아 갈 수 없었다. 전반적으로 도전과제 달성이 굉장히 쉬운 게임인데, 내가 달성하지 못한 두 개의 달성률이 제일 낮다. 나처럼 2회차를 다시 하기엔 답답함이 지겨운 자들이 포기한 도전과제가 아닐까 싶다.

38623942.review:
Of what I have played of Last Day of June, I was very impressed with what I had seen. I'm not usually a fan of indie games that focus on artistic expression, but where I'm a massive fan of Steven Wilson's music, I was drawn into giving this one a try. I managed to play an hour of it and I was very impressed, the art direction is clever and engaging and the narrative is simple to follow but a (so far) powerful re-telling of a usually cliche story. There is no voice acting, only suggestive grunts and noises, but I feel that only further nails the emotion in the story.

Here's where I have to give this a "not recommended" - the game doesn't run after a save file is created and the game is closed. After an hour of play I saved the game and decided to come back to it later, however the game no longer runs and crashes on the startup screen (re-installing, verifying game cache and the usual other solutions don't work here). From looking at the Steam forums, this seems to have been a problem since launch months ago with no suggestion that a fix is incoming. Take a look at the discussions board and you'll see it's a very common problem with the devs asking people to raise tickets via their website. This would be fine, however a lot of posts and comments are also saying that their tickets have been closed without any reason or fix. The only solution that the devs are providing on the discussions is to delete the save file and start again - not a suitable fix for a problem that shouldn't happen in the first place. Until this problem is fixed, I would not have to recommend this. If the problem does get fixed, I'll happily change this recommendation as the game itself is fantastic and exceded my expectations.

TL;DR: The game itself is fantastic and would definitely be worth a recommendation, however the game itself is subject to a known issue that after the save file is created, the game crashes on startup with no fixes. Devs don't seem to have much of a desire to fix the issue and instead would rather players delete their save file and start again.

38606783.review:
What I love the most about this game is that none of them talk. I thought about this early on in the game. It's so beautiful that the actions speaks for themselves. Without any words ever being said.

You meet Carl and June as they are on a picnic by the lake, I'd assume, their favorite place. The weather changes suddenly, and they have to go home. A terrible accident happens, and you wake up as Carl. He's in a wheelchair after the accident, and June has passed. Carl finds out that night that he can travel back through paintings to change what happened that day, and hopes to save June. I love that Carl is using paintings because June is an artist. 

To change the events of what happened you have to play as their four neighbours. The kid, the best friend, the hunter and the old man. The kid is seen in the trailer picking his football off of the road, and then causing the accident, so you have to change what the kid is doing. And the four other neighbours are also doing stuff that's causing the accident. I've seen people complain about how this is reptitive and boring. Especially because of the outcome. But to me, this is what the game is about. [spoiler]Telling us that some things cannot be changed. It's fate. No matter how much you try or how brutal it is. And in this case either Carl or June had to die. There was nothing you could do to change that[/spoiler]. The story is dealing with acceptance of losing a loved one. And that really made me think. If that's not a f****** good game, I don't know what is.

38273904.review:
这是[b]琼的最后一天 [/b]，不是[strike]六月的最后一天[/strike]。
 
[h1]逝颜旧忆初[/h1]
树影朦胧，湖水如镜，丈夫与妻子在夕阳下相互依偎。有寒风袭过，正在绘画的女人不禁打了个寒战，默默注视着妻子的他将这尽收眼底，随即向妻子表示要回到车里拿件衣物保暖，不料却在起身时险些把圆框眼镜跌落，这滑稽的表现逗得妻子捂嘴直笑，男人微笑着摆了摆手，继续走向汽车。等到他温柔地给妻子披上衣服时，抿着嘴的女人给男人展示了她崭新出炉的新画作——身着超人服装的他。女人和她的超级英雄相视一笑，嬉闹声再次在湖畔响起。白驹过隙，日暮西沉。斜阳下，女人拿出了精心准备的礼物，男人惊喜地接过了礼物，画面就此戛然而止。
这是Carl和他的妻子June的湖畔约会，只属于二人的浪漫回忆。
 
[h1]残梦瞬忆终[/h1]
原来，Carl和June居住在一个与世无争的小镇里。某一天，June计划给Carl一个惊喜，她拜托镇中的一位老者给Carl订做了一份特别礼物，然后和Carl一起去湖畔约会。
就当Carl准备拆开礼物时，一场雷雨来袭了，Carl放弃了打开礼物，急匆匆地和June一起奔回车上，准备驾车返家。然而，在归途中，宛若灾难般的车祸降临了。在这场车祸中，不仅june失去了生命，连Carl也永远的失去了双腿。
 
[h1]奇异人生？[/h1]
在June死后，Carl用上了轮椅，过着残疾人的生活。在一天夜里，Carl从车祸噩梦中惊醒，在触摸June的画像时，画像突然迸发出光芒，接着Carl发现自己似乎被赋予了某种特殊能力，这种能力和奇异人生中的主角Max的能力非常相似，居然能通过触摸画像穿越时空，重新回到那对与Carl来说宛若噩梦的一天，June的最后一天。Carl欣喜若狂，试图拯救他的妻子June，改变过去，重写命运。
 
[h1]世界线收束！[/h1]
Carl本以为他能顺利地拯救June，但他未曾料到，每当他在“最后一天”里改变一件事，等到他回到现在时都发现它们带来了意想不到的结果。为了拯救June，Carl又再次时空回溯试图消除“错误”。但事与愿违，他的所作所为只能再次引发新的事件，June始终难逃一死，仿佛有一种神秘的力量在不停的干预，像极了命运石之门中的世界线收束理论。当Carl成功消除了熊孩子乱踢皮球到公路的事件，避免了车祸的发生，但家具堵路再次导致June丧命。消除了家具堵路事件，山崖崩塌又导致June死去。消除了山崖落石，竟然还会有闪电劈死June！在这因果律一般的力量的干涉下，Carl一次次受挫，但他并没有因此绝望，他要拿什么拯救June？
 
 
[h1]爱与失去[/h1]
在“June的最后一天”中，Carl通过June的画作，在一次次的记忆回溯里，逐渐了解到了这一天所发生的事。他看到了小镇上的小男孩的孤独生活，没有任何玩伴只能独自踢着皮球度日。他看到了曾经爱慕自己的金发女邻局的搬离小镇，斩断过往生活的联系。生活奢华的猎人不甘受困与家族过往的荣光，想要走出父辈的阴影的尝试，白发老人丧偶后积极的独自生活，十年如一日。爱与失去的故事在这个小镇里不断上演，Carl失去了June，小男孩失去了自己最好的玩伴，金发女邻居放弃了对Carl的爱恋，猎人失去了选择猎人以外职业的权力，老人失去了挚爱的伴侣。
在反复尝试后，Carl终于明白，不是所有的过去都可以被改变，有些事注定是无法改变的。在这个世界上，某些事必须发生，必须要有人死去。他悲哀的发现，只有让自己代替June死去，以命换命，才有可能拯救June。既然必须要有人做出牺牲，就让我来代替June死去吧，这是我所能做出的最大牺牲。
这是Carl最后的坚决。

结局虽在意料以外，却在情理之中。对于结局，June视角的解读，尚存疑惑，此处不予置评。

[u]Last Day Of June[/u],一个关于爱与失去的  [b]童话故事 [/b]。
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1098956634

38250870.review:
Okay, so ... first off, my biggest recommendation here is to play this game when you're in a pretty chill mood.  If you're at all tense, the repetativeness of this game will get to you and drown out the overall "feels" and story as nearly happened with me.  However, in the end, I think this game is worth the ride and I do recommend it.

It's kind of a groundhog day varient; you repeat the same day over and over, from differemt perspectives, making minor adjustments to try and get the outcome your character desires.  The different perspectives interact with each-other; leave a gate unlocked from one perspective, and the other perspectives can see it.  It's not a real-tme switch; you play one character's entire day, resulting in some outcome, and only after you receive that outcome can you switch to another character.

The outcomes, together, determine the result.

Its actually a pretty cool way to tell a story.  I've never seen it done quite this way.  And the game is distinctive and reasonably pretty (the eye-less characters aren't really to my taste, but it didn't distract too much and I'm sure there's some deeper meaning there that I missed).

Here's what sucks; the little "mini cut scenes" that are repated many, many times and that you cannot fast-forward or skip.  For instance, you're going to see the little boy wake up and get his ball and kite knocked off at least 12 times in this game.  Or worse, you'll have to load the lady's damn box onto her truck and watch her poke her precariously stacked crap and examine her tie-down points about 6 times.  Each time is like 30 seconds of unskippable cut-scene.

It feels a little petty to complain about it, but it adds up.  And then, at the end of each day for each character, you're forced to watch the entire outcome.  This is a LONG cut scene, that you can't skip, and if you're going back and forth between 2 or 3 characters it adds up to a lot of get up and get a coffee time.  Unfortunately, during some of these longer cut-scenes, there's a requirement to press the 'R' key so you can't even refresh your beverage during them.

This cumulatively detracted from the experience for me a rather great deal, and I was tempted to quit when I got to the hunter's  trial-and-error minigame (with unskippable cutscenes in between each attempt).  I'm glad I stuck it through, but, this isn't a game you really want to attempt if you're liable to be frustrated.

I would have enjoyed this game a lot more if either you could skip the cutscene bits, or if they didn't make you repeat certain unnecessary parts.

The story also kind of bugged me, but in ways I can't really say without spoliing anything.  If I had to sum it up in 2 words, though, I'd say 'cumulative incompetence'.  Maybe I'm just too jaded to wax on about how sweet it is, I don't know.  I guess the point is that [spoiler]things can be both avoidable and inevitable at the same time.[/spoiler]

Anyway :)  Bring your patience and make sure your beverages are close by cause you're going to need to press that R key,.

[h1]拿什么来拯救你,我的爱人![/h1]

[b][i]这是一个关于爱与救赎的故事[/i][/b]

今天刚从影院看完《寻梦环游记》,便忽然的很想立即体验一下这款游戏,尽管她已在我的库中静静躺了很久......

如果你平时习惯了3A大作,但又恰好带着一丁点文青的细胞,那么不妨换一下口味,来试试《琼的最后一天》.

也许,总是一些这样或那样的缺憾,亦或是如此那般的不圆满,才组成了我们绝大部分的人生.守护着守护,生命之旅中苦苦追索,哪怕仅为了完成一次自我的救赎...只有在梦中的片刻,彷若一切回到从前,灵魂得以轮回.但是当梦醒之后,怅然所失的情绪让哀伤弥漫,痛彻心扉!

许多年之前,曾一度爱上了那些充满文艺气息的影片,一种发黄的淡淡的忧伤,仿佛从遥远的时间尽头走来...游戏似乎也在努力传递着这样的一种久违的思绪,让心灵寻回了早已抛弃的情感,在浮躁的凡尘中得到了一丝治愈和慰藉.

[spoiler]步过春光,醉老西窗.想起曾经爱过的人,曾经为了爱情,把自己降到尘埃里.当初再怎么也放不下的人,也都随着时光在记忆里慢慢的远去...[/spoiler]

37952105.review:
先说不足：
1.流程过短。满打满算只有3-5小时的游戏时长实在是对不起这个价格。
2.节奏感差。因为要不断切回过去尝试改变结果，所以要一遍又一遍的观看重复的剧情画面，关键还不能跳过。这个在已经很短的剧情流程里，又侵占了相当大的比例。所以会让人感到厌烦。难以形成行云流水的沉浸感。
3.不能自由存档。玩了一遍，准备先过剧情再回去做全成就。结果打通了之后，整个存档就消失了。只有重新玩一遍。这点体验真的很差。
4.剧情狗血。三个邻居形成的死循环真的是弱智一样的设计，当然考虑到游戏属性和剧情、氛围的变化，可能是制作方有意而为之。


再说优点：
1.游戏氛围渲染好：不同情景下的情感表达非常细腻，通过肢体动作、BGM以及背景变化，把游戏氛围烘托的恰到好处。
2.后半段情节感人：虽然故事结构很狗血，而且非常没有逻辑性。但是最后桥段算得上是非常感人，已有家室的人更是会感慨良多。
3.美术风格不错：油墨画塑造的小村庄以及人物建模都非常有艺术特色，虽然看的稍微久点稍微会有一些眩晕，但整体上还是很棒的。


总结：瑕不掩瑜，我认为这是个不错的游戏，但的确不值这个售价。

  一开始感觉有点阴森，然后反复操控每一个人，慢慢就有点烦躁，觉得剧情太拖沓。但是从老人开始的最后半个小时,全程都沉浸在游戏当中。最后结束的时候，泪目。命运往往无法改变，爱情至少可以让我牺牲自己。
  在我看来，游戏中女主的作用被淡化了，真正重要的是june面对情况的发展做出的每一个选择。
  沙发上醒来，在画室发现自己可以改变发生车祸的种种诱因，从孤独的小男孩，特殊的“第三者”，父亲的阴影下，男主认为我改变了这些，我妻子就能回来了吧。但命运就是如此嘲弄人，每一次醒来，面对的都是空荡荡的沙发。到了第三次，“所有问题我都解决了吧，该让她回来了“（与命运的每一次谈判注定只能以失败告终）。
  你可以给车上绑上绳索，让小孩不去踢球，甚至让猎人与动物共处，但你阻止不了闪电，你改变不了这命运。
  如果我阻止不了车祸的发生，那我就别让她出门，于是我特意安排好友和她见面，她就看不到那副画了。可悲的是，最后居然是我看到了它。命运依旧无法阻止。
  最终，一切都像是刚开始的那样，我依然摘了一朵蓝色的花给她，她也依然戴在了头上。只是，我们交换了位置。我改变不了命运给我安排的东西，但我可以改变我自己。
  车上，一直有一个按钮“告诉他”，他抬起了很多次头，终究没有说出口。但是我急啊，你再不告诉她，他就永远也不知道了啊。就像那个衰仔路明非，那个死小孩。
  “啵”，就好像火山集聚了许久终于爆发了，那双手里的“すきだ”，极大的震撼之中往往是永恒的宁静。我沉默了。没有真正谈过恋爱的我第一次看见了什么是爱情。平日的歌曲，电视剧淡化了我对它的理解，当它真真赤裸裸的出现我眼前时，唯有沉默。爱情从来不卑微，只是我站得太渺小。
  然后，就是灰色，人间的她，死去的我。艳丽的她，单调的我。拥抱，墓碑。












玩游戏就要浸在游戏中，理解作者想要表达的，比质疑他的逻辑要有趣得多。

37887313.review:
I could only recommend this to those that enjoy interactive story-telling with the patience to sit through repeating scenes. This vibrant and minimal beauty tells a story through memories and past, allowing control of multiple characters to determine a single outcome. It reminds me of the movie The Butterfly Effect in this way.

The problems are that it is short for the price, forces you to rewatch the same scenes multiple times, and has infrequent save points--not my playtime is due to leaving the game on to avoid having to rewatch said scenes to introduce even more tedium. This all aside, the story is very impactful and teaches a valuable life lesson, in my opinion.

Worth a play for the patient.

开端故事情节的代入感很好很专业。
前60%的解密玩法趣味性很一般，不能跳过动画不断消耗着耐心。
随后玩法在前后事件关系方面体现出新的变化和深度，让人有所欣喜。
最后进入结局阶段，故事情节和游戏体验急转直【上】，配音、音乐、画面、情节、玩法配合在一起打造出让人印象非常深刻的体验，简直让人直掉鸡皮疙瘩。
虽然对游戏整体的素质还是抱有一些遗憾，但结尾的部分完全值回票价，远远超出期待。

37652080.review:
A hauntingly beautiful game with a deeply emotional story.

In Last Day of June, you'll experience the story of Carl, who is trying to cope with the loss of his wife, June.
After a tragic accident, Carl is bound to a wheelchair, coping with his loss, when suddenly he can experience the past through some paintings, and change the course of actions that led to said accident, trying to undo everything and save his beloved June.

In those flashbacks, you take control over the neighbors of Carl and June, trying to find an alternative outcome of the original happenings.
You will walk around the neighborhood, interacting with the characters and items, trying to solve some rather simplistic "puzzles" (it's not really puzzles, more like "finding the right way and order to interact with items").

Throughout the whole game, there is also no real communication through language, everything the characters do and feel is told via gesticulation and unintengible mumbling.

The visuals feel like they have been painted (which i guess fit's to the story) and the characters are quite abstract, but nevertheless it's a beautiful game, with lush colours and a very fairytale-like look.
Not just the visuals are beautiful, but the soundtrack does a great job in supporting the story and bringing out all the emotions too.

The game really took me by surprise, as i didn't really expected anything. That way, the emotional impact was maybe even bigger.
There are few games that really touched me and got me all emotional, Last Day of June is definitely one of them.

One thing that might be frustrating (depending on how you're playing) is, that there is no free saving.
So if you quit the game without hitting an autosave point you might have to replay quite a portion of the game.

Apart from that, i'd highly (!) recommended to anyone, who likes games with rather simplistic gameplay and a deeply amotional tale about love and loss.

37650598.review:
本游戏别名《拿什么拯救你，我的爱人？》或者《全村人都想让我们死》。
以上纯属玩笑哈，游戏其实一点也不复杂，流程也并不长，但是画面风格很独特，音乐也很应景，情节设计是一大亮点，整个一周目玩下来，其实就是看了一部电影或者电视剧。
个人认为，游戏告诉我们的，就是“缘”，或者说叫“命运”。每个人每个行为都像一个齿轮，这些行为交织在一起，就像齿轮拼接在一起，最后驱动了一个固定的事件。男主就好像是穿越了n条世界线，就为了拯救女主June。但我个人的理解是，其实本来在事故中死掉的应该就是男主，因为整个游戏主要流程里男主没有遇到任何一个真人，其次就是结尾女主的笔记上写满了关于事故的细节，应该是June为了拯救男主才写的。中国的宗教文化里，人死后，灵魂过了鬼门关，没过奈何桥之前，有一个望乡台，可以回首自己生前的点滴，感觉这里男主就是这么个情况（不过不会是什么望乡台啦hhh）。还有就是所谓的命运，仿佛真的是注定的，就像游戏的一个成就“你无法改变”一样。然而命运真的就绝对不可能被改变么？男主告诉我们，这显然是错误的，能够改变命运的，就是爱，伟大的爱。

I bought this because I really enjoy Steven Wilson's music, but it turned out to be a really great game on its own. The story is interesting and the simple puzzles are not stupid "adventure game" bull-poo. They are just enough to pull you along and keep the story developing. Müziklerini Steven Wilson'un yaptığını duyunca oyuna hemen sahip olmak istedim ama o da ne? Resmen Steven Wilson'un Drive Home klibinin içindeydim. Drive Home'u dinleyip, klibini her izlediğimde duygusallaşan ben, bu oyunda da da gözyaşlarına boğuldum. 

Evet, biraz duygusal ve bu yönüyle de kadınlara hitap eden bir oyun olabilir ama bence "Küçük kararlarla sevdiklerimizin hayatını değiştirebilir miyiz, yoksa onlar ile sahip olduğumuz anın tadını çıkarıp gerisini umursamamalı mıyız?" biraz da bu soruların cevaplarına odaklanıyor bu oyun.

Oyunu saatler içerisinde bitirebilirsiniz, hedeflere ulaşmak çok zor değil. Mühim olan hikaye.

最开始看到游戏名字的时候以为讲的是一段发生在初夏的故事，然而June其实是女主的名字。

故事中的人物形象塑造的还是很不错的：没有玩伴的小男孩、届不到恋的黄毛妹、尊敬父亲的猎人、失去爱人的老爷爷。每一个人都有难以忘却的过去。

36624451.review:
十分细腻的一款游戏，说说几处打动到我的制作方面的细节：
CARL在雨夜坐着轮椅的那一幕场景，地面的水花、水塘的效果做得非常好，水塘只在斜坡下面有，斜坡上面就看不到水塘了。其实就算制作组不去做这个细节，也不怎么影响玩家玩这个游戏的观感，而且当时玩家的心思恐怕更多地放在如何帮助CARL拯救JUNE上，一心想着赶紧回屋，估计也不太会注意到这些细枝末节的地方，但制作组却细心地把水塘和水花做了上去。
CARL一开始在湖边送JUNE什么颜色的花，到了结尾处，CARL再次回到这个时空，JUNE的头上就会带着什么颜色的花。
这款游戏虽然一句从头到尾台词都没有（我只听到CARL和JUNE互相喊对方DARLING还有JUNE的好几句NO），人物脸上也没有表情，但通过肢体动作和人物嘴里发出的声音（不是说话声，是笑声、叹息声这一类的声音），可以体会到人物当时的情绪、想法和态度。

另外还有一点让我很好奇的地方，礼物盒里放的究竟是什么……

————————————————分割线——————————————
我发现关于收集好友的回忆的成就似乎达成的人比较少，写一下好友的回忆收集的地点：
猎人家的花园里
孩子家的花园里
后山小果树林旁边（需孩子的球把花瓶踢倒）
挂蓝色绳子的那个院子
挂蓝色绳子的那个院子对面的院子

故事上来看很多逻辑说不过去的地方，比如每次改变一次死亡结局出现新的死亡原因的时候心里都会素质八连：这特么也能死？好，看到最后我明白了，其实并不是男主在反复回到过去改变一切，从最后女主的素描本上来看，男主只是触发改变命运的关键，如何改变，怎么改变，都是女主策划操控的，所以最后发现怎么样也无法改变结局的时候她崩溃了。那么问题来了，素描本最后一页是女主画的男主的超人画像，be my hero，前面的计划实施过后全部无效，只有男主能改写她的命运，所以她把男主引到楼上，让他看到那些画，让他因为爱别无选择的回到过去用他的命换自己的命。”我想活，所以拜托你去死吧。我可是怀了你的孩子！” 等等，让我再看一眼游戏标题：一段关于爱与失去的冒险。

36522519.review:
Okay, I got this game on sale. Completed it in a few hours and a couple more to get all the achievements I missed the first time. 

I do like this game, the art is incredible, so unlike many other games - it's [b]beautiful[/b] in a unique way. The soundtrack is calm and sad and occasionally it will get stuck in your head. 

But, without ruining the story, the game itself is underwhelming. It's a little bit too predictable (in my case) and even though most of the characters are likable and fun in their own way, the overall length of the game was its downfall. I don't want to pay £9 on a 2-hour long game. I definately don't want to pay £15 either. The price is way too much for what it is and if I were you, I would wait for the game to go on sale for £4 or even £6.

This game also has [b]no replayabiliy[/b]. Once you complete it, there is no reason to play through it again. So unless you're an achievement hunter like me, you won't be playing this game twice. 

[i]Sadly I don't recommend at its current price.[/i] 

<3

36519798.review:
Thanks Ovosonico. 

I see a genre of games evolving that have their equivalent in literature in 'short stories'. Instead of dragging us through  prolonged and repetitive gaming events (sometimes even followed by multiple DLC's!) leaving me numbed, this genre presents us a story which grabs me by the throat in a few chapters and leaves me thinking. I like it.

I played this 'little' gem in 4 hours withour any hesitation to stop, like reading a short story. There is a 'ground hog day' feel to this one which scratches the feeling of annoyance but moreover keeps appealing to 'Feel and Think!' The real beauty in the game is that it draws you into the handful of characters that you meet, vividly captured in the fotobooks that you casually collect. Each one has its own merits, history and dramas. Twisting their fate feels exciting and troubling.

We all wonder about 'what if' ... this short story is about 'what if'. And imo also teaches something about the inevitable, and love and grief.

Very well done. Buy it if you are interested in short and good stories. 

ps. @Devs: please do not dlc this one. Build me another story instead. ;)

36518314.review:
爱与失去，人与命运。
一段悲伤却又美丽的故事。

一次又一次的希望，一次又一次的失望。已经不再有期待，却又不愿意放弃那渺茫的可能性。
结局看似改变，终究是回归原点。
有些事你只能接受，有些事你无法改变。
大约这就是命运，就是现实。

以上是个人感慨，测评而言：

+有特色有气氛的画面，个人非常喜欢

+音乐很棒，很有氛围

+人物丰满生动

+细节非常丰富

+剧情优秀

-玩法稍有些简单死板

-剧情重复播放，刚开始会让人觉得无聊，但是后面会发现有其深意【建议不要因为前期慢热而放弃



就我个人而言，是一个很棒的剧情向的游戏，虽然悲伤，但并不绝望，是一次难忘的经历。
推荐二周目。二周目才能发现里面数不胜数的细节，和制作组的细致用心。

以下含有轻微剧透。


这个游戏的细节真的了令人惊喜。
男主通过画纸回到过去，试图改变过去，拯救女主。
与画纸的互动也有不同的提示。从【拯救她】，到【遗忘】，到【接受】，满满的都是心酸。人物的动作也是十分的细致，虽然没有语言没有台词，也能从他们的动作神态和声调中感受到他们的心情。以为成功改变了的兴奋，发现没有改变后的愤怒，明白无法改变后的绝望，沮丧又不愿放弃任何可能的犹豫……男主的心情被完完整整的传递给了我们。
开始怀着轻松的心情玩这个游戏，最后却不由得经历了和男主相同的心路历程。其中老爷爷的剧情可以说是点睛之笔。“肯定有别的办法的”，当我怀着这个想法，跑遍了整个地图，发现别无选择时，我的心境已和男主完全相同。能够通过巧妙的设计做到这一点，制作者可以说是用心良苦了。
后期选择时，画面外女主的哭喊声，哽咽声，和撕画布的声音，以及最后女主画册中，在男主画像前几页的画面，更是委婉又浅显的揭示了故事的真像。【这些都是二周目才发现的，故强烈推荐二周目】

这是一个让我十分触动的游戏。虽然这是一个悲伤的故事，悲伤的结局，我仍愿相信这是一个治愈的游戏。

36500666.review:
Curto, cerca de quatro horas de duração. Ideia magnifica, simples, bonita. Trilha sonora perfeita. Também pudera: composta por Steve Wilson (Porcupine Tree e outros).

Aliás: Last Day of June é diretamente inspirado na música e clipe [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycYewhiaVBk]Drive Home[/url] que em sua letra melancólica te diz para seguir em frente.

E, bem, você vai entender.

Tal como já vimos em Butterfly Effect (2004, Eric Bress, J. Mackye Gruber) e em jogos como Life is Strange, aqui temos a [i]chance[/i] de voltar no tempo e corrigir algo. O Efeito Borboleta aqui se aproxima mais do filme de mesmo nome estrelado por Ashton Kutcher e é uma mecânica interessante e bem aplicada de forma trágica.

Poderia ser melhor e talvez você entenda isso durante o gameplay. As ações de cada personagem são ligadas e ficam gravadas. Até aí, perfeito. Acontece que às vezes para chegar num determinado ponto essencial que desencadeia algum evento, você precisa de outro personagem e esta necessidade não tem ligação emocional direta. Torna-se apenas um jogo em que você move as peças e tira um pouco do clima que é recompensado mais tarde.

A arte de Last Day of June é belíssima tal como o clipe de Steve Wilson. Os personagens não falam e você não tem textos, mas é possível entender perfeitamente bem tudo. E isto é perfeito.

Certamente um jogo memorável pela mensagem que ele tenta passar, ainda que eu considere o final como algo que de certa forma foi usado apenas para criar um ar de graça. Crença pessoal.

36481629.review:
"Last day of June" is not exactly a game. It is an hybrid between a game and a very well written movie. If you haven't played this game yet, consider buying it. It's worth your time (3/4 hours of gameplay) and your money. 
The graphic is unique and Steven Wilson's music is a perfect fit. To enjoy this game you have to play with the proper mindset, you will dive in this beautiful world and you'll emphatize with the characters without even realizing it. 
If you watched the trailer you already know the plot: Carl and June, husband and wife, have a car accident. Carl ends up in a wheelchair and June dies. 
Your purpose in this game is to prevent the accident manipulating the events caused by the characters (the kid, the lady, the hunter and the old man) and you'll discover more details about them by collecting all their memories.
At first I thought that the impossibility to skip the cutscenes was a big mistake because it makes the game too repetitive and even boring if you don't play it with the proper mindset. But then I realized that maybe it was a choice of the creators to let the player feel what Carl is feeling, being forced to watch the accident over and over. 
I will definitely follow Ovosonico's updates hoping to see other games like this.

P.S I just realized, while I was writing this, that the title "Last day of June" has a double meaning and I feel very stupid not to have noticed it right away.

36118690.review: 玩的时候就知道这是个悲伤的故事，但我这没想到这结局。这让我想起了蝴蝶效应1里面，男主发现怎么改写都是BE，最后他选择牺牲自己来让其他所有人HE.不光是这部电影，很多这种类似改写的都是以为了爱人而牺牲自己为结局。这大概就是爱的伟大之处，敢于牺牲。死亡当然是可怕的，但也许失去所爱才是最可怕的。要是我是June，每天活在没有爱人的生活里，大概觉得每一天都是折磨。世界再大都没有你，无比绝望。游戏里，熊孩子失去了自己的玩伴，老人失去了自己的老伴，富豪失去了自己的父亲，好友算是失去了所爱的人。每个人每天都活在没有爱人的一天里，但他们并没有June这样改变过去的能力。所以他们只能活下去，为了死去的爱人，为了活着的人。我在想是不是这样，死亡会变得不那么可怕，因为死后也许就会回到爱人的身边了。但我仍然为June做的选择心疼，June当然是愿意的，难以做出选择的是我们玩家而已。留下来的人要缅怀死去的人一辈子，如果我有爱人，我希望我是晚走的那个。

36022848.review: Short and sweet. It's a bit repetitive - because of how the story is told, granted - but since you can't skip cutscenes it can get a bit tedious when you have to see some of them over and over again. The game is really short either way though, so it's no big deal. I liked it. It's very easy, you will have no hurdles to overcome, but it's just an interactive story after all. Well-told, without any dialogue; only by gestures and mumbled voices. The visuals are simple but beautiful, and the music is fantastic - which comes to no surprise if you enjoy Steven Wilson's work, of which this game is based upon. I recommend it if you're looking for a short, but good, story-driven experience. The value comes down to how much you're willing to spend for a few hours of story.

35980849.review:
玩通了，觉得像是一个浪漫的童话绘本，虽然游戏性不强，但是游戏整体精悍短小所以注意力基本都在股市上，考虑到故事演出不错，还是值得一玩的。

优点：

+ 有特色的画面

+ 生动的人物

+ 优秀的剧情演出

缺点：

- UI不太亲切

- 解谜方法太死板



画风我喜，风格很独特，虽然看实况很多人吐槽没有眼睛但是我个人还挺喜欢这种标新立异的画风。而且这么重视景深的同时还弄了这么个绘画效果滤镜的游戏我以前真没见过【可能是我孤陋寡闻……】，而且最不可思议的是笔电可以跑这样的游戏……我本来以为这么好看的渲染会让我的电脑烫到能煎蛋的……

画面之外，地图设计方面我也很喜欢，设计地很自然……比如说一开始我故意控制男主不去拿衣服而是试图离开，想看看有没有什么迷之成就，但实际上没走几步那恶犬就会出来把男主挡回去。以及男主坐轮椅之后，很多地方因为台阶上不去，于是虽然地图还是那个地图，却因为轮椅的限制造成很多地方暂时无法探索……这种设计比硬生生摆一个空气墙在那里或者“蹦”地出一个对话框说：“我不应该过去”之类的更讨我的喜……哎呀真的我特别喜欢这种用这种用游戏内角色的肢体动作来暗示/指导玩家的设计……感觉现在很多游戏仗着自己有对话或者文字描写就忽视角色在动作表情上的演出了，所以看见这种重视肢体动作的游戏我还挺开心。

哦虽然没有对白，但是角色的肢体语言已经清楚到可以讲清楚故事和人物关系的程度了，而且那些装作是对白的恩恩啊啊声情绪还是挺到位的，比如一开始控制男女主看大家画像的时候，对每个人的声音都是不一样的，而且能很明显感觉出对那个人的态度如何，这种不需要特定文化背景就能让人明白的演出真棒啊♥

但虽然开发者在训练玩家行为和塑造人物方面十分机智，但是在游戏节奏上我就不敢恭维了……也可能是我最近玩的游戏节奏都比较快，于是不怎么适应这种慢悠悠的走路模拟……总之玩到目前为止，一个强烈的感受就是要经常倒回去逆天改命重复刷——虽然已经触发的情节是会被自动跳过的，可是也不是直接跳过，而是要先看个几十秒再跳……还不能手动加速或者提前跳过……本来一周目想全靠自己的，但是再反复反复再反复改之前的人的命的时候真是被那些动画折磨地不行……就放弃了于是开始看攻略…………

还有就是有些地方操作不怎么友好，比如不能强行终止目前这一天，不能即时存档，而且菜单只有直接退出游戏，都没有从存档点开始或者重新开始这个人的这一天的选项，卡关了的话就很抓狂。

以及游戏看似选择多样，但其实流程很单一，比如一开始必须是让小孩从玩球变成玩风筝，出了金发女之后就是一定要改成小孩玩球，再出了猎人之后就又一定要小孩玩风筝了……这也太单线程了！于是所谓的解谜也不过就是不断刷前面反复试错的过程。

不过玩到后面发现故事演出还是很不错的，比如那种无可救药无法挽回的感觉，啊，虽然故事老梗了，不过得益于这种优秀的叙事手法，梦幻美丽的画面还有细腻的动作，我竟然对着这样的故事泛起了泪光呜呜呜……【不是故事不好，只是我最近还玩了奇异人生，ever17之类时空穿越的作品……一时间对这种题材比较麻木……

不得不说，里面镜头语言的运用真不错，如果我当年学动画的时候玩到这个游戏一定会被里面的动作和演出感动地流泪的。

Отличная игра про то, как главный герой по имени Карл, пытается изменить события, приводящие к трагедии и гибели его возлюбленной Джун.  Игра выполнена в мультипликационном стиле с видом от третьего лица. Сюжетные задания, которые придется выполнять, не сложны. Игра расслабляет и проходится на одном дыхании. Достижения не сложно зарабатываются, плюс одна идеальная игра в профиль.
Игра короткая, но и цена совсем не кусается. А по скидке брать не задумываясь.
Однозначно рекомендую.

35683478.review:
Although visually and audibly an enjoyable game to play, Last Day of June has a few issues that caused me to not be able to recommend it overall. The first has to do with the story itself. The story portrays a tragic car accident very early on in the game (which can be seen in the trailer that was released,) and involves the protagonist survivor Carl going back in time to try to prevent June from dying. During the game, glimpses of their past is shown that reveal how their relationship was in the years prior to the accident. Memories of several of the other characters can also be collected as an optional part of gameplay that give additional background on them as well as for Carl and June. The problem is the lack of most of this background before the accident occurs, apart from a short flashback that briefly introduces the characters and explains why Carl and June decided to go to the dock. The player knows almost nothing about these characters when June dies, and it's difficult (in my opinion, though some may disagree) to have an emotional response about her death. Later on in the game, after discovering how their relationship had been before she passed, it's much easier to sympathize with Carl's loss. However, in my opinion, this occurs too late. Had the player been able to either see sequences of them interacting in the past in the prologue of the game, or better yet to actually play through scenes that highlight the love that they had for each other, the car accident would have been far more impactful, and the urgency of trying to save her would make the story much more enjoyable to experience. As it stands, however, the story felt a bit mediocre.

The second was game design decisions that can cause the game to feel a bit irritating. The biggest offender was the lack of a method to skip cutscenes. While most of the cutscenes were integral to the story, some of them are inevitably shown multiple times as the player figures out how to progress. This is essentially the same as an extended loading screen, and can be very frustrating to wait for. Another design flaw comes from the memory collection system. This optional part of the game was a plus, as it promoted exploration of the village as well as revealing background information for the involved characters. The issue was that although backtracking was enabled in the first three chapters, it is suddenly removed without warning once the story proceeds to the fourth chapter. This causes any player that missed one of the memories for the kid, best friend, or hunter to have to wipe their save and start the game all over in order to be able to collect them. This could have been prevented by either separating the sections for the memories of the old man from the others, or by giving a warning when the player has found the correct solution for all characters in chapter 3 that they won't be able to go back if they continue on with that choice. Another decision that the designers made was to limit the sections that the game would be saved. While the game can certainly be completed in a few short sessions, players that are forced to replay large sections of the game because they had to turn it off just before reaching a checkpoint can find the game a bit annoying. Finally, the lack of multiple save files to choose from means that players have to wipe their main save every time they want to show a friend how the game looks or to let them play it from the beginning.

Some may argue that the linearity of the game is another problem that this game suffers from. I disagree, however, as although it is certainly linear, it is not very noticeable unless one plays through the game a second time to collect any missed achievements/trophies, and honestly is fairly typical of games that put a much higher focus on storytelling than on gameplay. Additionally, some may say that the length of the game is far too short since it can be completed in just a few hours. Although I do wish it were a bit longer in the case of this story, I have played other games that did not take very long to finish either and enjoyed them quite a bit, so having a short completion time is not necessarily a problem in and of itself. Finally, some may complain about the artistic style that was used to create the character models. This shouldn't be a major concern, however, because the trailer and screenshots for the game clearly show this design and does not come as a surprise to anyone that decides to get the game. Furthermore, they make sense in light of the game being based off of Steven Wilson's song Drive Home, whose music video on YouTube shows a character that looks very similar to Carl. 

This last part is not specifically a spoiler and is kept somewhat vague intentionally, but is placed inside spoiler tags in case it is viewed as such. It is intended to be better understood by those that have already completed the game, and expands a little more on the first paragraph above.
[spoiler]One part of the story that doesn't make much sense is the fact that Carl is alone when he wakes up after the accident. He's been alone for quite some time as evident by the state of the house. Why is no one helping him or staying with him? One could argue that the best friend left, but that is illogical considering her background story as well as the fact that she witnessed the car crash. The old man obviously cared about him, and even the hunter had a sympathetic side as evident by the last cutscene involving him. If Carl simply shut them out of his life in his grief, why not clarify that? It seems like a missed opportunity to not mention it all, and could have even made the ending more moving if it had shown him considering how his final idea would affect the other people in the village, assuming that the story had shown them caring for him rather than just being nonexistent.[/spoiler]

In conclusion, I do wish I could rate this as a recommended game, as it is very well done in regards to the beauty of the environment, and the music is enjoyable to listen to as well. Unfortunately, though, the problems presented in the first 2 paragraphs above are enough of a concern to cause me to not have much desire to share it with friends, and should be kept in mind in contrast to those that reviewed the game positively here when considering whether to acquire this game or not.

35476265.review:
+================================
+本评论涉及剧透，未通关人员请小心
+================================
简洁明了的一出默剧，却给人一次短暂而又难忘的心灵之旅。


自我见解：
[spoiler]就像那个成就一般，有些命运你无法阻止。
琼的最后一天就如西泽保彦的那本书《死了七次的男人》一般，男主卡特不断的轮回，跳跃回忆试图改变车祸的命运，到头来还是无法避免，因为即使你排除了所有的人祸，命运之神还是告诉了你，你无法躲避这场灾祸，而最后留给你的唯一的选择（至少还给了你一次选择），就是谁获救。当然，这也是N次世界线跳跃的结果，原来的世界琼依然无法避免死亡，而卡特只能孤独终老（毕竟暗恋卡特的妹子已经黯然神伤离开了）
而新世界线留给的琼的则是命运的结果——卡特的死亡，与新的希望——他们的孩子降世。
这里不说这个结局的问题，单纯来看游戏里每个人角色的共性，在我看来那便是孤独。
从所有人的回忆便可看出：小孩子因为小伙伴的离开而孤独，女好友因为卡特选择了琼而孤独，猎人因为父亲的阴影而孤独，老者因为伴侣的离去而孤独，当然还有卡特与琼这对命运伴侣各自的孤独。
在我看来，每个人都对自己的孤独做出了相应的选择，不论它是好是坏，选择即为命运。你既然选择了这条路，那么就必须承受起相应的命运。[/spoiler]

35467674.review:
Last day of june est un jeu indépendant incroyablement bien foutue. Le jeu nous pousse sans que l'on en prenne conscience à prendre des choix moraux pour une finalité que l'on pourrais considér comme très idéalistes et égoïste. Nôtre femme subis un accident de voiture alors que nous étions le conducteur. Mauvaise nouvelles, elle n'y réchaperas pas et même vous le conducteur êtes gravement blesser car vous finisser en fauteuil roulant. Deux vie détruite? Non, trois. Malheureusement et vôtre personnage n'en savait rien. Le voyage initial avait pour but de vous apprendre la merveilleuse nouvelles. Plutôt gacher la balade.
Le design est parfaitement minimaliste, à t'el point que tous les être vivant de la zone n'ont aucun oeil, un trou y ressemblant vaguement en est la représentation. Mais sa ne dérange nullement le jeu ou le design car le village déssiné de facon abstraite est magnfique avec ses reflets d'or envoyer par le soleil sur les vieilles batisses où vive le couple, un enfant, une amie, un chasseur et un vieillard. Tous des personnages secondaires et pourtant tous des personnages qui on un rôle à jouer dans l'horrible vérité qui va se dévoiler petit à petit dans le jeu.

Le jeu malgré des couleurs prononcer et chatoyante est très sombre car plus l'on avance plus l'on comprend le choix auquel seras confronter le héros. Le jeu nous explique insidueusement que la fin est la fin et que jouer avec le temps est une mauvaise idées. Cette journée seras la plus longue des journées pour le personnages au super pouvoir, mais le pouvoir de manipulé le temps peut-il permettre d'éviter la mort là où elle est censer être?

35401864.review:
怎么说，这并不是一款传统意义的好游戏。画面和音效都值得称赞，但游戏节奏却相当缓慢（对于大众玩家是相当难受的）
如果游戏流畅进行，玩家大概在三小时就可以完成整个游戏流程，对于大多数游戏玩家来说这款游戏并不适合
但在类似多线性手法的故事推进中，却又清楚的发现其实自己在走单线程的游戏剧情。
无奈，无法阻止的游戏体验表现的很彻底。
这是一款可以让你带入其中的游戏，可以让你抉择的电影
此外，我不推荐没有经历过恋情的人，或则没有经历过离别的选择这款游戏
这款游戏有相当强烈的主观感受，如果没有情感体验，这会让你觉得很糟糕的游戏

35400903.review:
[h1]值得一玩的小品级游戏！该拿什么拯救你，my love！[/h1]

游戏通过2-4个小时的打造的电影般的互动体验，讲述一段关于爱与失去的冒险，整体情节环环相扣，表现十分出色，有那么点蝴蝶效应和因果关系的感觉，配合游戏出色的音乐BGM，拿捏的十分到位，一次体验的话效果最佳。

[h1][u]情理之中,意料之外[/u]的剧情展开，是万事休矣还是一线生机？[/h1]

故事通过类似于默剧的方式（仅有语气声、动作声和环境声），从Carl与June湖边约会开始，然后让我们跟随Carl的每一次“噩梦与惊醒”逐渐深入的从每一个人物（小屁孩、好友、猎人、老爷爷）的视角了解[u]琼的最后一天[/u]事件的全貌，Carl近乎疯狂的无数次的念想着如何“改变过去”只为了拯救她，我的爱人June，然而有些事情无法改变、无法阻止，一切的展开既在情理之中，但是故事最后又着实让我感到出乎意料和意外的温馨，整体层层递进，徐徐道来，感人至深、至诚。

[spoiler]些微剧透：这一天是Carl与June永世分别的一天，是小屁孩孤独自处的一天，是好友告别过去重新开始的一天，是猎人在父亲阴影下重拾自我的一天，是老爷爷无数个失去老伴仍然将强活着的日常的一天，是Carl无数次想要改变的一天。[/spoiler]

这一天，描绘了包含了所有人的所有思绪，是关于爱与失去的故事，但又不仅仅是爱与失去，更多的细腻的情感待你细细体会。

[h1]油画表现出的印象画派风格，浓墨重彩，但又朦胧模糊[/h1]

这种画风还算比较独特，请根据个人接受能力选择，也许刚开始玩会让人感觉不适，但是与剧情搭配在一起却又感觉别具一格，在短短的2-4个小时流程中还是能说可以接受的，长时间游玩会感觉“头晕目眩”，[u]一次体验[/u]并不会太存在这种情况。

[h1]出色的配乐，很好的烘托氛围与表现情感[/h1]

不管你知道与不知道Steven Wilson这人是谁，玩下游戏来音乐给我最真实的感受就是与剧情搭配在一起太棒了！awesome！

伴随着游戏中个性鲜明的音乐，音乐与故事展开从起承转合的完美融合，与游戏的整体较缓慢的节奏也很搭，不需要太多的溢美之词，音乐真的很棒！

[h1]这是一场互动式的电影体验[/h1]

这[u]不是[/u]一款解迷游戏！这[u]是[/u]一款剧情体验为主的辅之以步行模拟的电影式体验的独立游戏！

没有什么花里胡哨的各种操作，简单到极致的按键，就4个（确认、查看、奔跑、暂停）主要按键贯穿游戏始终，游戏想给玩家们的是一段关于爱与失去的冒险，细腻的画面呈现带给您电影般的深刻体验，整体上还是做到了，游戏性上面毕竟不是“大作”，不能与其他动作冒险类游戏相比。

[h1]再见！再也不能相见！[/h1]

不管游戏结局如何，Carl与June的别离是没跑了，这一切到底只是Carl一厢情愿的[u]妄想[/u]还是真的发生了的[u]奇迹[/u]，就要留给玩家自己去判断了，不过我一直相信，不管如何，活下来的人都要坚强，生活还在继续，to be continued~

Life is difficult.It is a great truth because once we truly understand and accept it, then life is no longer difficult.

35346652.review:
Just finished this astoundingly gorgeous game....but no replay chapter option or save slots is to me a huge dissapointment.
What a shame. No saving in the game until auto-saves (which are far apart in the game) at what I would describe as "chapter points."
If you've spent a half hour wandering around or trying different options in gameplay, but need to quit out, it brings you back to the last checkpoint area,which in some instances is WAY back in the game. Replaying huge swaths of gameplay,even a game as enjoyable as this one, is not a pleasant thing if you're an adult and need to attend to non-gaming matters thus necessitating the need to quit out of a game.
I can't for the life of me understand why developers nowadays, especially devs of a game as complex in choices as this one, wouldn't either create more save points, an F5 (quicksave) option, or, like many games: multiple save-at-will points.
And now that I've finally gotten through this (otherwise wonderful) game, my only option is to replay the ENTIRE game from the beginning (restart)? That seems quite unfair.
To be truthful, as mentioned it is a BEAUTIFUL game, with a rich storyline, a rich soundtrack and unique graphics. But because of the complete lack of saving at will, the option to replay from the beginning doesn't entice me.
NOTE: if the almost complete lack of savepoints and/or the only end-game option being restarting from scratch the entire game doesn't bother you fellow gamers....then you're in for a treat with the game as it's beautiful and the story will leave you emotionally spent. SO: "frequent savers" beware!

35274786.review:
https://niveloculto.com/analisis-last-day-of-june/

A poco que sean algo melómanos conocerán a Steven Wilson, fundador, vocalista y guitarrista de Porcupine Tree, con unos treinta años ya en esto de la música. Y si no le conocen, presiento que Last Day of June será una genial manera de hacerlo. El videojuego de Ovosonico (Massimo Guarini de Murasaki Baby y Jess Cope, animador en Frankenweenie) no se esconde, es deudor absoluto de una canción y videoclip del autor (Drive Home). De hecho, casi podríamos decir que es la adaptación al formato del videojuego de la propia obra, un trasvase que creo que apenas se ha dado en la historia del medio, ¿no?

Y sin embargo, no hace falta hablar de música para hablar de Last Day of June, no hace falta conocer la historia que tiene detrás ni haber seguido la carrera del músico inglés. Porque la propuesta del juego es fácilmente comprensible y la hemos visto en más sitios: el amor segado cuando aún (creemos que) no había llegado su fin “natural”, la tragedia aplastando la vida de quien queda detrás y, de repente, la posibilidad de volver un momento a atrás. De recuperar al ser querido que hemos perdido, de paliar el dolor absoluto y terrible que se ha hecho con nuestra vida.

Por supuesto, nada es tan fácil.

Empieza así nuestra batalla contra el destino, reviviendo con otro de los personajes (están el Niño, el Viejo, el Cazador y la Mejor Amiga) las últimas horas en las que hubo alegría. Descubrimos rápidamente qué fue lo que trajo la desgracia a nuestra vida y tratamos de ponerle remedio. El puzle es sencillo y agradecido, no requiere de un gran esfuerzo mental por nuestra parte y parece que resuelto un tema con un esquivo balón de fútbol todo se arreglará.

Por supuesto, eso no ocurre. Al igual que en ese videojuego olvidado que es Reperfection, rápidamente descubriremos que el problema real está en que si cambiamos algo, cambia también lo demás. El destino no se toma a broma que tratemos de manipularlo y va a ponernos muy difícil que recuperemos la vida de June, cuyo final ya estaba escrito y estaba mucho más cerca de lo que esperábamos.

Como aventurilla de puzles sencillos, uno podría suponer que va a pensar muy poco en Last Day of June y, bueno, acertaría. El único desafío que hay lo iremos encontrando a medida que se enmarañe el pasado y tengamos que intercambiar, de manera cíclica, cosas en varias historias para que todo encaje. Pero es que lo importante no está ahí, sino en la propia experiencia que nos propone el juego, esa lucha sisífea en la que el ciclo alivio-cabreo, satisfacción-dolor del protagonista permea todo el ambiente.

Ese ambiente es dibujado con un estilo cercano al impresionismo, con un uso magistral de los colores y un efecto de difuminado a medida que alejamos la cámara que le da un aspecto extraño y onírico a lo que está sucediendo. Al principio, ya lo he dicho, colores cálidos por doquier, naranjas y amarillos que nos hacen recordar ese eterno verano de la adolescencia que deseábamos prolongar aún un poquito más. Y en el presente, al que volvemos con cada uno de nuestros fallos, colores fríos para ahondar la decepción y la soledad, porque sólo el pasado era bello y lo que queda por delante es tristeza y añoranza.

Parece bastante evidente lo que pasará al final del juego, pero por mucho que seamos capaces de predecirlo, el mayor mérito de Last Day of June está en sabernos emocionar por el camino. Logra hacer que pasemos por las mismas fases de engaño y desengaño que Carl, que conservemos el espíritu de lucha y nos queden fuerzas para seguirlo intentando una y otra vez. ¿No les parece más que meritorio, aún cuando el desenlace es bastante previsible?

Quiero, antes de terminar, reprocharle una cosita a Last Day of June. Teniendo un protagonista postrado en una silla de ruedas creo que, salvo en varios momentos muy señalados, no se da demasiada cuenta. Es cierto que a veces se hace difícil avanzar por el escenario, pero también que todo se desbloquea, sospechosamente, cuando ha de hacerlo, invitándonos a seguir un camino en el que apenas padecemos la dificultad adicional que se insinúa al principio.

Hecho este tirón de orejas creo que no hay demasiado que objetarle al juego. Se mete en un terreno espinoso y muy jodido, como es la muerte de un ser querido, y lo hace sin demasiada pornografía emocional. Sabe ser tierno y dulce, pero también mostrarnos la quiebra emocional de Carl. Por el camino hace también una lectura importante sobre el ensimismamiento de cada uno: está claro que rompería su mecánica jugable que los personajes que controlamos en el pasado interactuasen, pero no más claro queda que si alguno hubiera ayudado a otro o simplemente le hubiera hecho caso… la cosa habría cambiado mucho. Y sus puzles, aunque muy sencillos, acaban formando parte de un rompecabezas mayor que disfrutaremos “resolviendo”.

Al final se guarda una última sorpresa, que terminará por tocarnos el corazón si no lo había conseguido ya antes. Y qué bien ver cómo lo logra sin ser deshonesto ni tramposo. Dando empatía y pérdida sin tropos absurdos, emocionalidad sin exhibicionismo y candor sin cursilería. Uno ha de jugar a más cosas así.

Last Day of June es un juego narrativo al 100%. No es un juego para todo el mundo, ni siquiera para todo el mundo que busque experiencias de este estilo tan enfocado en su narrativa. Nos ofrece una historia bonita y reflexiva que seguramente llegue al corazón a más de uno, aunque ciertos en ciertos momentos parece restarle importancia a la fluidez de su historia para caer en la reiteración. No es un gran juego, pero se podría decir que es una obra de arte interactiva que falla precisamente en eso… en la interacción con el jugador.

El estilo visual y la narrativa hacen completamente recomendable a Last Day of June. No os arrepentiréis.

35133053.review:
Достаточно мрачная история с не менее криповым видом и посылом на то, что всё происходит так, как должно было произойти. И не нужно ничего пытаться изменить.
Для начала: выглядит крипово, т.к у героев отсутствуют глаза в глазных яблоках. Там просто пустота. =)
У нас есть 2 главных героя, чью судьбу мы творим. Влюблённая парочка. И 4 второстепенных персонажа, от действий которых будут зависеть наши жизни. Думаю, из названия игры всё становится понятно.
Что касается графики: она не плоха. Необычная, но не плоха. Не совсем понравилось замылевание дальнего фона. Из-за этого немного уставали глаза и было трудно разглядеть какие-то предметы. Но в целом не плохо. 
Не могу сказать, что игра прям держит в напряжении. Интересно, что будет далее, но не прям что бы до жути. 
Не понравилось то, что приходилось переигрывать несколько раз за одного и того же персонажа. И это не я тупой, а игра так задумана. =) Ладно, если бы просто переигрывать. Но там есть долбанные кат-сценки. Ненавижу, когда их нельзя пропускать. А тут еще и смотреть их приходится по несколько раз.
В общем: хорошая история с хорошим посылом. Не пытайтесь изменить то, что уже произошло. 
Ознакомиться стоит определённо. + и ачивки все лёгкие достаточно, которые могут собраться за 1 прохождение. (для умных. Но т.к я тупой, мне приходлось перепроходить игру 3 раза что бы собрать одну и ту же ачивку).

35097190.review:
[h1]A nice heartfelt exercise in frustration.[/h1]

I really enjoyed it! Not as much as Brothers, but I can justify its length and price tag from where I live. Game looks nice and unique, reminiscent of an oil canvas painting, and I'm willing to forgive it for its inconsistent DOF, dropping framerates and blocky shadows. Music is appropriately subtle and not having intelligible dialogue does great for the visual storytelling. It's still pretty fun to wander around and interact with things just as it was with Brothers, though you do run out of stuff to explore as the story takes place in roughly the same few areas with but a few differences.

The groundhog day scenario did start to bother me as a large part of the middle section involves doing some things several times over and not being able to skip cutscenes. The game also breaks a few rules of cause and effect in favor of the story, but I'm willing to overlook that despite having played some other games with much better understanding of time travel. Despite the game's pacing issues, the story it sets out to tell is worth seeing through to the end and wraps up perfectly for what it's going for.

I can't say I've never seen stories like this before, but I think Last Day of June has more than enough clever ideas in gameplay and mute storytelling to warrant its existence as a short but decent time travel game. I liked it. 3.5 hours well spent.

35096109.review:
6月の最終日を舞台に、とある集落の夫婦の交通事故を防ぐお話。
日本語対応だが、そもそも字幕も特定言語での音声も存在しない。

プレイヤーは事故後、時を遡り他人に憑依するというなろう小説みたいな能力を得た夫を操作し、あらゆる手段を使って事故当日の事象を操作し事故を防ぐ事を目的とする。
1つの事象を防ぐと、今度は別の事象が事故を発生させる…という、まるで世界が改変された事象を元の状態に補正しようとするような動きをし、プレイヤーは何度もトライアンドエラーで事象を改変する必要がある。若干のパズル要素あり。
というかこの集落総動員で事故発生させに来るので半分ギャグ入ってる。

プレイ時間は3時間程度だが、事故のシーンに対するスキップが実装されていないので、多分プレイ時間の1/3は事故のシーン。
また、収集要素としてマップに各キャラクターのバックグラウンドを描いた絵が配置されている。
グラフィックや雰囲気、音楽は凄く良いが、上記スキップが無い部分でフラストレーションが貯まる。
トライアンドエラーが多いゲームなのに何度も事故現場など見たくはない。本当にここで損をしている。

だが、個人的に終盤の展開は意表を突かれたためおすすめ。興味があればセールの時などに購入すると良いと思う。

35050751.review:
[H1][b]Unglaublich schön und traurig[/b][/h1]

"In der folgenden Bewertung werde ich meine Meinung äußern, dann ich finde die beste Bewertung eines Spieles kommt von einem selbst. Man kann zwar mit einer solchen Bewertung wie von Gamestar sich einen Ersteindruck verschaffen, aber um es 100% für sich zutreffend bewerten zu können muss man es selbst erlebt haben!"

[b]Bewertung:[/b]

[b]GRAFIK[/b]
Ein ganz persöhnlicher Stiel, sehr zeichnerisch und künstlerisch. Die augenlosen Figuren wirken zwar etwas gruselig, passt trotzdem perfekt zum Setting und Atmosphäre. Leider hin und wieder etwas überbelichtet und die unschärfe passt manchmal nicht ganz!
8/10

[b]SOUND[/b]
Er wurde perfekt in Szene gesetzt und unterstützt die Atmosphäre und das Setting perfekt. Obwohl die Figuren nicht reden, weis man nahezu immer, um was es gehen könnte, welches durch die Töne (und Musik) sehr gut unterstützt wird. Einzig am Ende fand ich die Musik etwas unpassend (persöhnliche Meinung)! 
[u]9/10[/u]

[b]ATMOSPHÄRE[/b]
Unglaublich gut gelungen, durch Sound und Grafik und die Inszinierung wird das Spiel unglaublich athmosphärisch. Eins der athmosphärischen Spiele, die ich je gespielt habe. Man muss jedoch erwähnen das es sehr speziell ist aufgrunde der sprachlosen Figuren und des ungewöhnlichen Grafikstils!
[u]10/10[/u]

[b]BALANCE/UMFANG[/b]
Das Spiel ist echt kurz, aber sehr intensiv. Kurze Story und selbst alle Errungenschaften sind schnell geschafft. Ich musst aufgrunde eines Bugs neu anfangen, aber nach ca. 2-3 Stunden ist man 100% durch. Perfekt für einen schnellen emotionalen Tripp!
[u]9/10[/u]

[b]BEDIENUNG/GAMEPLAY[/b]
Wenig zu merken, da man sich nur bewegen muss und die Kamera schwenken kann. Jede interaktion wird angezeigt. Sehr einfach gehalten, da es um die Story geht und nicht um das Gameplay. Passt aber gut zur Inszinierung und verhindert unnötiges Suchen!
[u]7/10[/u]

[b]LEVELDESIGN[/b]
Kleine Spielwelt, in welcher man sich nahezu frei bewegen kann. Durch die Grafik und Sound super angepasst und wunderschön, aber auch duster (Tag/Nacht | Sonne/Unwetter)!
[u]10/10[/u]

[b]SPIELPRINZIP[/b]
Man muss mit jeder Figur die andere unterstützen um vorran zu kommen. Dabei muss man immer wieder die Vergangenheit ändern und für Andere den Weg freiräumen. Kein lineares Storyspiel, sondern eins mit einem schönen Prinzip dahinter, was die STory perfekt unterstützt. So ein Stiel hab ich noch nie erlebt und es gefällt mir sehr, da man sogar etwas nachdenken muss, aber meistens wird einem geholfen!
[u]10/10[/u]

[b]STORY[/b]
Unglaublich gut gemacht. Der Fokus liegt auch auf der Story und dies ist perfekt gelungen. Sehr schön, aber auch unglaublich traurig. Jede sprachlose Figur hat trotzdem eine Persöhnlichkeit. Und [ACHTUNG KLEINER SPOILER] das Ende ist soooooo traurig, aber auch irgendwie schön. Alles wird super durch Grafik und Sound unterstützt und passt in die Atmosphäre perfekt rein!
[u]10/10[/u]

[b]SPIELEWELT[/b]
Klein aber Fein. Schöne kleine Details und je nach Figur kann man mit der Umgebung anders agieren um unter Umständen anderen einen neuen Weg zu eröffnen. Einfach nur toll!
[u]10/10[/u]

[b]EXTRA PUNKTE[/b]
Obwohl das Spiel sehr kurz ist, bereue ich die 20 Euro nicht. Unterstützt mehr solche Entwickler, bitte mehr von sollchen Spielen!
[u]10/10[/u]

[b]FAZIT[/b]
BITTE, BITTE kaufen, wenn ihr auf schnelle und intensive Tripps steht, welche sehr storylastig sind. Besser als einige Tribble-A Titel. Ich breue keinen Cent und wünsche mir mehr davon!
[u]93/100 Punkte entspricht einer Wertung von 93%[/u]

35043691.review:
[b]◉ 本文含有大量剧透[/b]

有些事情注定发生，有些情人终将离散，但爱是不变的存在，就像这款作品中描绘的那样。卡尔和琼的爱情不会因上天作怪而消散，两个人为了对方算尽一切，还是逃不开命运的选择。那一天分离终将到来，能改变的或许只有生命的延续吧。

Last Day of June 以电影的形式向玩家再现了琼的最后一天，惊艳于极具诗意的油画场景，沉默于重复出现的车祸与结尾时感人的真相。如果每个人都能拥有这样至死不渝的爱情，这一辈子就够了。仿佛再次经历《双子传说》的生死离别，虽然结局并不圆满，但4个小时的游戏体验却无与伦比。

[quote]◉ 感谢奶牛关野蔷薇与505 Games提供体验机会
◉ 点击阅读[url=https://cowlevel.net/game/Last_Day_of_June/review/2726851]图文评测[/url][/quote]

[h1]以画为船，时间旅行[/h1]

在知名导演 Massimo Guarini 的执导下，伴随着 Steven Wilson 的音乐，故事上演···这一天是卡尔与琼的结婚纪念日，两人驾车来到恋爱时约会的湖边。在夕阳的映衬下，湖面与草地都被染上黄昏的色彩，如梦般的油画场景，令人沉浸在步行模拟的视觉体验中。

近黄昏，大雨骤降，这也预示着厄运的到来。当一切将要发生时，卡尔倏然从梦中惊醒，深蓝色的夜空下，独卡尔一人，借着轮椅搜寻回忆，这些昔日佳景都定格在琼的油画中，可画者已逝。游戏未曾透露这是琼离去的多少天或者多少年，玩家只能从卡尔落寞·的面部细节与积灰的房屋推测。

深蓝色的阴暗小楼像是一座鬼屋矗立在小小的村落上，画面中卡尔打开了久未开启的画室，不时传出诡谲的声音吸引着他，屋外与屋内同样神秘又恐怖，这种气氛通过画面音乐与手柄的强烈震动传达给我，像是在玩一款恐怖游戏，有些失望，有些疑惑。这也是我给本作4星的理由之一。

玩到这里我才知道，卡尔依靠琼富有灵魂的画作进行时间之旅，以画中人的视角重现最后一天，玩家可以改变每个人的行动，以不同的方式结束最后一天，或许这样就可以拯救琼？游戏中，共有5名人物供玩家扮演，全部都是立体油画风的无眼大头人，起初看起来有些恐怖与丑陋，习惯后是另一种不同于寻常的感觉，与油画场景完美结合，每一幅截图都可以装裱成画，向观者诉说他们的故事。

[h1]故事不长，读懂不易[/h1]

开发团队用4个小时的时间向玩家完整立体的重现了琼的最后一天，游戏虽然没有配音，但每个人的性格与情感都用无言的声音与细微的表情传达，有时爱慕有时失望，每个人都有属于自己的故事与经历，收集场景中散落的回忆，回顾每个人过往的曾经。游戏中的收集元素很少也很简单，总共20个回忆散落在不大的村落，只需片刻寻找就能轻易获得。

[spoiler]在这短短四小时里，我感受到了琼的后悔与愤怒，她后悔把礼物送给卡尔，后悔一起驾车前往湖边，虽然她也试图用画笔改变这一切，但尝试过后，才发现车祸是上天的安排，即时每个人都不曾出现，暴风雨与雷电依旧在那里，永远在那里。故事的结尾，当卡尔看到被穷隐藏起来的婴儿房与琼的画册，隐藏多年的秘密终于揭晓。琼也做过卡尔做的事，两个人牺牲自己拯救对方，到最后始终逃不脱命运，相爱的人注定阴阳相隔，改变的只有生命的延续。[/spoiler]

游戏中的解谜十分简单，仅仅是每个人结局的排列组合，而在每个人的故事中，解密无非是推倒花瓶，开启栅栏等等，像是在玩一款简单的步行模拟，在小小的村落里重复着前进，重复着车祸，而在经历了多次车祸画面后，我有些不耐烦了，游戏并不能通过这样的手段增加可玩时长，最重要的是这些过于重复的画面没有多大的作用，我知道你们想强调卡尔的悲伤，但3次就够了吧，我可能看到了20次车祸，每次一样的失望与难过，作为一个观影者，这样的结局我是不想看到的，这也是我给游戏4星的主要原因，少了《双子传说》中多样有趣的玩法，也少了那一份意境。

[h1]结语[/h1]

想了想，还是给了瑕不掩瑜的评价，琼与卡尔的爱情故事的确很感人，但这些过于重复的回忆画面与狭小的活动空间令我着急，有时候很想跳过这些重复，却没有跳过设定，于是一遍遍地重复把这些感动一次次消磨，在游戏结束，我首先的想法就是终于结束了，之后才是对于游戏剧情与隐藏细节的思考。可能有不少玩家都没有发现琼画本上的隐藏剧情，我也是在重温截图后才发现的，而这隐匿的细节才是真正感动我的情节。当最后一刻，琼与儿子拥抱，故事也画上了句号。

35040120.review:
游戏只玩了小半部分，大概也知道了结局。故事安排的很精巧，只是不太习惯找东西。如果非要说败笔的话，真的把人物改成无声就好了，背景音乐分量有点少。

游戏的色调倒是和我喜欢的一首[url=http://music.163.com/#/song?id=22822564&autoplay=true&market=baiduhd]《家路》	[/url]很配，很像午后舍不得的那份“恬静”，向日葵般的柔和、纯粹而明亮。

在午后我幻想着就这样坐在沙发上空看着远处略带油画质感的云，那朵像极了插上了翅膀的大鱼，它叫“海棠”？另一朵像趴在什么上的考拉，充满了信任的它应该是被宠溺的吧，还有一马当先的那只犀牛，飘着飘着就变成了浪花里的海豚了。云海透过窗框犹如幻灯片，被这么自然轻易的卷动着，这时脑子里蹦出一个词“过眼云烟”。

我知道自己的想象力是丰富的，就像喜欢上一个人总是轻易的想去“一辈子”，毕竟在这世界里，爱情已是为数不多的信仰之一。当然，我还有过“很多冒险的梦，想要很多人陪我去疯”，所以问着大脑里的编排，看看能留下什么，于是有了这篇《时间回逆者的传说》。

[i]从前有个男孩儿，路上遇见了一位姑娘，他没敢开口，而错过的懊悔让他日渐消瘦。日积月累使他身染重疾，这种执念似乎感化了上苍，他得到了一种可以随意进入他人梦境的能力，在梦里他走进了她的小世界里。男孩儿想，她一定会爱上这样爱着她的自己的，可梦醒后的他仍旧孤身一人。

男孩儿并没有气馁，他下定决心，可以抛弃一切乃至生命，只为了与她相守一世。上苍看他发的愿如此浓烈，于是在梦里施了魔法，这一次他的确是和她在了一起，可梦醒后躺他身边的却是另一个女人，这个女人自私且丑陋，就像一开始说的那样，他绝望的抛弃了生命。

死掉的男孩儿开始迁怒于上苍，“为何总是欺骗我的感情”他愤怒的骂着。上苍又不动声色的答应了他，给了他梦寐以求的能力，不仅可以回逆时间甚至还可以在不同的平行时空中来回跳跃。运用这样的能力他排除掉了其他竞争者，紧紧抓住朝思暮想的女孩儿。不过后来男孩儿仍旧没有如愿，她没过多久就死掉了，因为一种根本无法医治的怪病。

他的偏执型人格使他发了疯似的在各个时间点寻找答案。首先是从第一次的许愿开始的，原来，那次的他走入女孩儿的梦境让他融入了姑娘的视角，在那个角度去看的时候也同样没有选择当时的自己；第二次，他放弃了自己的身体附在了注定和她相依的另一个男人身上，由于抛弃了自己，他自己的躯壳被女巫迷惑了，所以当他醒来时躺在了女巫的身边；而第三次，他去了还未有改变的初始的平行时空，在那里，那位姑娘仍旧和她爱的人幸福的在一起。原来每个平行时空的主人不同，那个在他自己创造的时空里的深爱的姑娘，得了他第二次死掉时患的相思抑郁症，只不过他那时想的是那位姑娘，而那姑娘想的是另一个人。

他醒了，他在想这故事的前前后后，假如真能随意改变别人的轨迹的话，我又和那个丑陋且自私的女巫有什么区别，如果爱只是为了得到，最终也会走向失去，但如果一开始就没有得到的话，反而一切都会像那片度满金边的云一样美好。他同时发现，真正包容他的是任由他胡为的“上苍”，可以予他任性的资格，伴他成长，甚至为之献出生命。于是在之后漫长的岁月里，他学会了拒绝一些不切实际的幻想，只用闲暇的时间回味那些美好的点滴，毕竟那四分钟的偶遇怎可抵得过一生，而剩下的时间应该干些有意义的事，比如走到过去抚慰来时的自己——原来他便是他自己的上帝。[/i]

最近感觉过去种种又有太多的事情像是被安排好的，所以很难有与自己相处的时间，于是听了一本书叫《断舍离》——断掉不必要的杂念和欲望，舍去多余的思念和烦恼，从而达到出离执念的状态。我按照书上说的试了下，并且成功的有了为自己烧菜的冲动，也开始喜欢上了叠被和布置房间，原来整理家务就是和自己相处的一种方式，一头一足间让自己慢下来，放松，充满了自洽的气息，由外而内找到更好的自己。

时间稍长，发现脱离了曾经沉醉的，迷离的，浑浊的妄念，在不想什么的日子里，却活的更加真实了。午后“闲暇”，阳光正好，用时间洗涤身上的浮尘，这时的我——极净。
